'''''The Dark Side of the Balemoon''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Meetings in Outrealm: Series V]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat [[The Knave]] in [[Co-Op Mode]].

==Trivia==
*The name of this achievement is most likely a reference to {{W|The Dark Side of the Moon}}, a studio album by the English rock band {{W|Pink Floyd}}.
